/** Colors */
/** Font variables */
/** Mixins */
.taxonomy-agency .block-page-title-block, .taxonomy-topic .block-page-title-block, .page-node-type-featured-topic .block-page-title-block { width: 100vw; position: relative; left: calc(-1 * (100vw - 100%) / 2); }

.taxonomy-agency .block-page-title-block::after, .taxonomy-topic .block-page-title-block::after, .page-node-type-featured-topic .block-page-title-block::after { background-color: rgba(11, 29, 53, 0.8); bottom: 0; content: ''; height: 100%; left: 0; position: absolute; right: 0; top: 0; width: 100%; }

@media (max-width: 575.98px) { .taxonomy-agency .block-page-title-block, .taxonomy-topic .block-page-title-block, .page-node-type-featured-topic .block-page-title-block { background-position: -211px center; } }

.taxonomy-agency .block-page-title-block .block__inner, .taxonomy-topic .block-page-title-block .block__inner, .page-node-type-featured-topic .block-page-title-block .block__inner { display: grid; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 946px; padding: 3.5rem 0; position: relative; text-align: center; z-index: 1; }

.taxonomy-agency .block-page-title-block .pre-title, .taxonomy-topic .block-page-title-block .pre-title, .page-node-type-featured-topic .block-page-title-block .pre-title { color: #99CCFF; font-size: 1.125rem; letter-spacing: calc(1rem * .03); text-transform: uppercase; }

.taxonomy-agency .block-page-title-block .split-headings span, .taxonomy-topic .block-page-title-block .split-headings span, .page-node-type-featured-topic .block-page-title-block .split-headings span { font-family: "Lato"; font-size: 1rem; margin: 1.25rem 0; }

.taxonomy-agency .block-page-title-block h1, .taxonomy-topic .block-page-title-block h1, .page-node-type-featured-topic .block-page-title-block h1 { font-size: 2.5rem; color: #FFFFFF; }

@media (max-width: 991.98px) { .taxonomy-agency .block-page-title-block h1, .taxonomy-topic .block-page-title-block h1, .page-node-type-featured-topic .block-page-title-block h1 { font-size: 2.125rem; } }
